description: This indulgent creamy chicken bake recipe has an added nuttiness to excite the palette
name: Chicken & Leek Bake with a Macadamia Crust Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. Add the butter, breadcrumbs and macadamia nuts to a pan and fry up for 2 minutes on a medium heat while stirring.
Remove from the pan and set to one side. Now pan fry the vegetables in the olive oil while tossing for 4 minutes.
Now add the chicken and cook for a further 6 minutes. Now add the sauce and cream and allow to simmer while stirring for 8 minutes so the sauce can reduce and thicken.
Remove from the heat and empty the contents into a deep baking tray and layer the breadcrumb mix on top.
Roast in the oven for 20 minutes and then remove from heat. Allow to cool slightly before serving.
